name: Whole life carbon: The WWF Living Planet Centre as an exemplar of low carbon construction
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This seminar will look at the practical implementation of whole carbon measurement through a case study on the Living Planet Centre, WWF-UK’s new Headquarters building in Woking.

presentations.name: The client's perspective
presentations.speakers: Colin Butfield, Director of Campaigns and Public Engagement, WWF-UK

presentations.name: The design strategy
presentations.speakers: Mike Taylor, Senior Partner, Hopkins Architects

presentations.name: Whole life carbon
presentations.speakers: Simon Sturgis, Director, Sturgis Carbon Profiling LLP

presentations.name: Delivering on site
presentations.speakers: David Adams, Technical Director, Willmott Dixon
